query.statement: SELECT rownum as no, cu.cnm || '(' || cu.cus_no || ')' as cus_name_no, co.code_name as incoStacC, cc.entr_date , cc.retr_date from custom cu, enmn_cont cc, code co where cc.cus_no = cu.cus_no and cc.inco_stac_c = co.code

SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_lcls_c, prod_mcls_c, prod_scls_c, prod_sell_entr_dt, prod_sell_end_dt, asts_mng_org_c, prod_offr_org_c, last_chng_usid, last_chng_dt FROM prod_base WHERE 1=1 and prod_no = :vo.prodNo
